name: Kirk Degiorgio
description: '''Kirk Degiorgio''', better known as "'''As One"''', is a British [[techno]] [[record producer|producer]] and [[Disc jockey|DJ]]. Born in the late 1960s in [[Stepney]], East London, and raised in [[Suffolk]], he started producing music in the early 1990s. He founded the labels A.R.T. Records and Op-Art Records and releases on them as well as B12 Records, [[R&S Records]], New Electronica, and others. His style is a mixture of Detroit-style techno, mixed with [[funk]], [[soul music|soul]] and [[jazz fusion]]. He is one half of The Beauty Room.
